Sorry, I thought it was Iguanus.

::Slayer::

Slayer turns from the computer, checking himself over to make sure that 
he could make the trip to get Prebon. He checks the computer again, 
seeing that Ignatius was awake.

"Ignatius, this is Slayer," he says into the comm to the fellow 
Trainer, "We were defeated at the Iron Fist. I'm on my way to get 
Prebon, I'll be back soon."

Slayer ends the transmission and exits the base, launching off.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> It's Ignatius not Iguanis.
> 
> 
> Ignatius woke up to find himself in the CR chamber. His wounds were healing
> successfully and he'd soon be ready to fight. He looked outside seeing the
> other three chambers were empty. The Eaglebot stretched his wings far as he
> could inside the cramped tank. He didn't know what happened he just knew
> that things were either better than he thought or as bad as he had feared.
> "Computer, who is present in this base?" he asked softly almost hoping it
> wouldn't respond.
> 
> "Slayer is scanning on the bridge." it responded in an echoing mettalic tone
> fit for the voice of a hollow unfealing machine.
